direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve price-related information for symbols, but ticker24H focuses on 24-hour statistics while tickerSymbol provides the latest price.
Both methods provide market data for symbols, but ticker24H focuses on 24-hour price changes while bookTicker provides the best price/qty on the order book.
Both methods handle symbol-based requests with similar parameter checks and use the same underlying requestHandler for sending public requests.
Both methods provide price change statistics, but ticker24H focuses on a 24-hour window while tradingDayTicker provides statistics for a trading day.
Both methods provide price-related information for symbols, but ticker24H focuses on 24-hour statistics while averagePrice provides the current average price.
